summary: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.
cast: Idris Elba|Naomie Harris|Tony Kgoroge|Riaad Moosa|Zolani Mkiva|Simo Mogwaza|Fana Mokoena|Thapelo Mokoena|Jamie Bartlett|Deon Lotz|Terry Pheto|Zikhona Sodlaka|S'Thandiwe Kgoroge|Tshallo Sputla Chokwe|Sello Maake Ka-Ncube|James Cunningham|Zenzo Ngqobe|Gys de Villiers|David Butler|Robert Hobbs|Garth Breytenbach|Armand Aucamp|Carl Beukes|A.J. van der Merwe|Graham Clarke|Andre Jacobs|André Stolz|Thomas Gumede|Anrich Herbst|Louis van Niekerk|Adam Neill|Nomfusi Gotyana|Lionel Newton|Michelle Scott|Jason Cope|Ndoni Khanyile|Patrick John Walton|Robert Coutts|Wessel Pretorius|Ronni Gadula|Edgar Sindane|Theo Landey|Sibusiyisile Msuthwana|Unako Poswayo|Khayalethu Anthony|Presley Chweneyagae|Paul Harris|Nokuthula Ledwaba|Nokuthula Dlova|Kgosi Mongake|Grant Swanby|Atandwa Kani|Siza Pini|Lindiwe Matshikiza|Refilwe Charles|Semuhle Shangasi|Khumbuzile Maphumulo|Mzu Ntantiso|Joshua Mañana|Sinakho Motsepa|Liyema Sixishe|Likhona Kwitshana|Luzuko Mbaleki|Solulele Mbombo|Letisha Singh|Shoki Mokgapa|Neo Modimogale|Nicola Hanekom|Henrick Reisenhofer|Dean Fourie|Warrick Grier|Danie van Rensburg|Nikelo Mpupumiso|Phumzile Nokwe|Masiza Mbali|Hamilton Lunga Buthelezi|Zondwa Njokweni|Bongani Maseko|Jabu Tshabalala|Obed Baloyi|Bubu Mazibuko|Michael Mabizela|Mark Elderkin|Peter Krummeck|Marcel van Heerden|Eduan van Jaarsveldt|Thobani Tshangana|Ntoza Talakumeni|Albert Pretorius|Carel Nel|Emily Whitefield|Joanie Combrink|Drikus Volschenk|Dylan Horley|Rassie Brits|Jacques Gombault|Tertius Meintjes|Morné Visser|Rob van Vuuren|Sivuyile Ngesi|Richard Lothian|Thembinkosi Njokweni|Adriaan Heijns|Ashley Saunders|Buyile Mdladla|Vuyo Dabula|John Herbert|Khanya Mankayi|Kgaogelo Mooka|Mary Twala|Sihle Dlamini|Sipho Mampuru|Sambona Masebeni|Tadini Masebeni|Aletta Majola|Kgomotso Ditshweni|Peter Khubeke|Lizwi Vilakazi|Rohil Aniruth|Walter Cronkite|Andrew Germishuys|Nabeel Khan|Nelson Mandela|Winnie Mandela|Marc Pleass|Stuart Sedgwick|Paul Steyn|Desmond Tutu
title: Mandela: Del mito al hombre
